review_data.title: Excellent food and friendly staff
review_data.content: Excellent and and very fresh food, nice and friendly staff. This is one of the best Chinese food you can get in Oerlikon. With CHF 16.50 for a chicken dish is good value for money.

review_data.title: Любимый семейный ресторан
review_data.content: Это наш любимый семейный ресторан ! Всегда вкусно, дружелюбно и по приемлемой цене. Идеальный вариант для будничного ужина

review_data.title: clean and friendly neighbor restaurant
review_data.content: Good: Very affordable price and generous portion. They expanded and now have tables to sit down but seemed like most people come in and take away. Bad: Not really authentic Chinese food, limited menu...but I guess my Swiss neighbors don't really care ;)

review_data.title: Nice friendly place with good food
